spalor.regularization.thresholding.sparseProj(x, s)[source]¶

Given an np array x of any size, returns the projection onto the set ||x||_0 <=s. :param x: np array of any size :param s: number of nonzero entries we want :return: nparray of the same size as x with ||x||_0 <=s
